name: black-flute
effect: Used outside of battle : Decreases the wild Pokémon encounter rate by 50%.
short_effect: Halves the wild Pokémon encounter rate.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A flute made from black glass. It makes it easier to encounter strong Pokémon in the place you use it.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A flute made from black glass. It makes it easier to encounter strong Pokémon in the place you use it.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A flute made from black glass. It makes it easier to encounter strong Pokémon in the place you use it.
